website_summaries.verdict: Several users had a positive experience with the Under Armour Charged Rebel. According to them, although it’s not an excellent shoe, it was able to deliver the expected performance. On the other hand, some wearers were unhappy with the durability and the apparently insubstantial design.
pros: A lot of users stated that the shoe was comfortable even for daily use
The midsole yielded sufficient cushioning and support, according to a wearer
The upper was breathable, and the shoe felt terrific in long-distance runs
Many customers liked the design of the Charged Rebel
Various runners mentioned they were satisfied with their performance while wearing the shoe
cons: One user was disappointed that the shoe’s materials looked cheap and flimsy
Parts of the shoe wore out after only two weeks of use, a buyer observed
Some testers lamented that even in the 2E width, this running shoe was still too small
The back of the shoe rubbed against the Achilles and was uncomfortable, commented a wearer
A runner said the outsole was inflexible and was slippery on many surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Physical Therapist Assistant, active and on my feet, work 4 ten hour days, these shoes are a dream come true. I have no arch and wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Truthful Fishing Tale

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he loves them. He says they are really comfortable and lightweight. Great quality which I expect from under armour.
customer_reviews.author: T Nycole T

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, good fit
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking shoes and have an upscale look to them for a very reasonable price. I have many different pairs of Under Armour shoes now and find that this brand has a more consistent fit than Nike across their variety of shoes. With Nike I find some fit my foot at the arch differently than others and cause pain towards the end of a day of walking. Under Armour does not seem to have those same issues for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent cross country runners
customer_reviews.text: These were for my son. First pair I received were slightly soiled on the soles for some reason (return?). Second pair have been great and are getting miles added to them daily. He enjoys a comfortable fit, "they look good", and are sturdier than the last UA shoes he got and put 300 miles on.
customer_reviews.author: Kaptainkaveman

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband to wear on casual Friday at work and around town (he has a similar pair for the gym). Have lasted a year. He does complain at times that they are too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: k.jordan

customer_reviews.title: Overall, great shoe. A little tight.
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market to replace my old running shoes, I've never bought shoes online, and depending on the brand, I wear different sizes. i somewhat regret not heeding the warning that others have posted in their reviews. I should have erred on the side of caution and went a half size up. That said, the shoes are great. They are snug and definitely help support my ankles. They're light weight, flexible and breathe well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: 5 in other Under Armour shoes and these fit perfect. That is one the I can say about ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit as expected. I where a 10.5 in other Under Armour shoes and these fit perfect. That is one the I can say about Under Armour in general, when it fits at one size it fits the same in the same size in other items. I buy Under Armour because they support the Wounded Warrior Project and me being one myself I appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Huet

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Saw lots of review saying these sneakers were very comfy so gave it a shot. I found them somewhat uncomfortable, especially relative to the equivalent Sketchers brands. You have to wear socks with them because the inside of the shoe is scratchy.
customer_reviews.author: SpyderMan

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were not comfortable at all. The insert had little to no cushion. We ended up returning these
customer_reviews.author: NLA

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for husband, he wears one size up for Under Armour brand for best fit. Nice color and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: MIKKI FLEX

customer_reviews.title: Meh - there’s better fitting shoes out there
customer_reviews.text: The look really nice, but the arch is really intrusive. Not a fan, but hoping I get used to it cuz I’m too lazy to return them and try shopping for another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Son likes them.
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas present for my son. They fit perfectly and were delivered on time. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Southerngrace99

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe. Higher heel than I was expecting, but overall good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good, fix perfect and look very nice, very confortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable pair of shoes i have them on most days and have not had any issues with hurting feet.
customer_reviews.author: TCfishing

customer_reviews.title: Good find and great fit
customer_reviews.text: Breaths well, firm fit and an amazing feel while walking/hiking. Would suggest these over some other pairs I've purchased
customer_reviews.author: Dustin V.

customer_reviews.title: ... reviews and bought half size up and they fit great. Great shoe and especially for the money
customer_reviews.text: Went by the reviews and bought half size up and they fit great. Great shoe and especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I would recommend this for walking (not running as advertised).
customer_reviews.author: Emilesp

customer_reviews.title: I love prime wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: In the photo they look grey and were more of a navy blue and were a little big. I love prime wardrobe
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers for good price.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. The quality that you would expect from UA at a great amazon price.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.S.K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes. They fit well, and feel comfortable, but the eyelets have started falling off after a few months, so I gave it a 3 star.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Garza

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Under Armour makes great tennis shoes and this is no exception. Love them and they look sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far a lot better then the nikes I had
customer_reviews.author: james snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, usually shoes are tight in the toe ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, usually shoes are tight in the toe box but these have some give which fits well. Grip is meant for pavement or solid surface, not recommended for grass or wet conditions
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Ripped with first uses.
customer_reviews.text: Toe box ripped on the first day of use. Plastic toe box folded and ripped shoe. Other then that this is a nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: MCATC

customer_reviews.title: Running Small
customer_reviews.text: Good but small you have to order 1 size bigger than your normal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes feel great, good build quality. My only gripe, is that with the breathable material, if you even walk through wet grass, your feet are soaking. Order a half size larger than you would normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon dykes

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this shoe. After about 6 weeks of normal wear, there are tears in the side and the bottom sole is coming off. Expected more from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: John Kalb

customer_reviews.title: ... purchases these shoes for my stepdad and he absolutely loved them! The fit was perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchases these shoes for my stepdad and he absolutely loved them! The fit was perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these shoes. they got comfy and the price was great
customer_reviews.author: augusto

customer_reviews.title: These shoes look better in person and fit even better
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look better in person and fit even better. Sizing was spot on. Theses shoes are very comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. Tried them on a 5K. Very happy with the comfort levels, style and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Leung

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit,good price. Looks great. Delivered on time. Amazon Rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's a totally uncomfortable shoe, no cushioning at all, breaks you're back, really regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: VINOD C.

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and fit just right
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves them! They are comfortable and fit just right. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Leola Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am really satisfied with the purchase from amazon and i will recommend everyone to shop amazon.!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kunwar

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product. Fit is great. Great quality item.
customer_reviews.author: landmcheckout

customer_reviews.title: UA hasn't fixed their problems
customer_reviews.text: I tried under armour shoes 2 years ago. I didn't like them then and still do not like them now. These shoes are not comfortable. The outer sole is way to hard and slippery on many surfaces. The inner sole provides no support or cushion. Also the shoes overall isn't flexible or breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: Returned - didn't seem to be wider than standard. ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned - didn't seem to be wider than standard. Wished they'd offer larger sizes and wide options for other shoes. Went with New Balance 940v3, extra wide instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them larger because of the reviews I read but now they are a little large but they are still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: eswart82

customer_reviews.title: Order Big
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were very narrow and definitely a size smaller than marked
customer_reviews.author: SDUNK

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe though
customer_reviews.text: Seems that all shoes are being made somewhat smaller. In most shoes I wear a size 13, but in these I had to get a 14. Nice shoe though.
customer_reviews.author: Charles  Jamerson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They fell apart after 2 months. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Doerr

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Ua Charged Rebel 1298553-002 Trainers
product_meta.description: Modern universal shoes with zip. Rich-Skins offer a luxurious and elegant look with delicate butter. The interior climate is breathable and hygienic thanks to the pleasant fibre system.
feature_bullets: Size 2E designed for athletes with wide feet.
Lightweight mesh outer material built for better ventilation.
Coreshort panels on the metatarsal provide ultimate support and support for metatarsis.
Micro G molded soles fit your foot and ensure a good fit and cushioning
A dual-layer cushioning midsole is firmer under the heel and softer under the forefoot for a blend of support and comfort built for performance.
